author: Richa Shukla
title: Highlighting issues through dastangoi
text:
The play Toh Hazreen Hua Yun , was staged at Ravindra Manch on Sunday.
City duo Shubham Pareek and Ankit Verma presented two different stories, written by Pakistani couple Ashfaq Ahmad and Bano Qudasia. Presenting the play in the storytelling art of dastangoi , a 16th-century Urdu oral storytelling art form, both the stories highlighted current issues like class discrimination and sexual abuse.
Said Shubham Pareek, a young theatre actor as well as the director of the play, "It's an old art to highlight burning issues. We plan to highlight more such issues through the art of dastaangoi ."
